html:
What hast thou here/whom hast thou here. Isaiah asks Shebna, "Who do you think you are, that you make a great sepulchre for yourself, that you are trying to exalt yourself?"

thou hast hewed thee out a sepulchre. Shebna tries to imitate God and God's glory with permanence (sepulchre) and self-exaltation (on high). The location of Shebna's sepulchre is unknown, although some scholars place it with other tombs carved in rock in the valley of Kidron, east of Jerusalem.
